Much cleaner and easier to read format. All unnecessary information was also removed.   Please let me know if this meets the requirements. 

Let me know if you need further changes. 

This met all requirements provided.

Was anything unclear in the instruction? No additional context was given to guide us in getting the text right according to the instructions. The instruction led us to conclude that as long as the text is correct, it would make sense to focus on the obligations set by the good structure (good for human reading) was the first priority then left with the next prompts we solved all problems that was pointed out.


But in general, more context can always be provided, to increase:

* Confidence that text has all relevant aspects that is expected there
* Interpretation of objects to be formatted, how they interact. 
* Matching writing style of used items properly is a piece that seemed like minor legislative authors.
